and the ensuing panic, which has virtually annihilated social interaction outside of shopping at Walmart.
Anyway, if you attend an event like this in the future, resist the temptation to show off for everyone by

or doing something else stupid on a public road. Police know car meets can lead to reckless driving. In this case, they spot a Dodge Challenger blocking traffic momentarily. These officers fail to notice the Hellcat badge on the front fenders, so they think they‚Äôre dealing with just a run-of-the-mill Mopar.

A chase ensues and the Hellcat makes it to the highway. That‚Äôs probably when the only pursuing officer we can see at that point realizes he brought a knife to a gunfight. His Ford Police Interceptor just doesn‚Äôt have the power to keep up at all. Once the Hellcat pulls away, weaves through traffic and disappears from view you never see it again. Yet the officer is still determined to catch up with the guy. We doubt he‚Äôs much of a gearhead, otherwise he would‚Äôve realized the pursuit was over before it ever really began.
Even after all that, the police officer remains optimistic. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll get him next time.‚Äù
